title: FS: T206 Zach Wheat - nice shape
author: SMPEP

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Zach Wheat - nice shape
posts.post_content:
Hi All,

Up for sale is a pretty nice T206 Zach Wheat.  See the scans for details on condition (note: I think the corner wear looks a little less in person than the scan portrays).  I should also note, the card is not perfectly flat.  It has a slight waviness to it. Not much, but wanted to mention it.

Looking for $150.  Goes to the first person who says they'll take it for that price.

Cheers,
Patrick

Nice card, Patrick.  Good luck with the sale.

For anyone interested, couldn't find a nicer seller.
